MAN.TITLE: plot2d2

PARAM.P: [ ] : see plot2d for a description of parameters.

DESCRIPTION.P: plot2d2 is the same as plot2d but the functions given by (x,y) are supposed to be piecewise constant.
By default, successive plots are superposed. To clear the previous plot, use xbasc().
Enter the command plot2d2() to see a demo.
